name: spotify-playlist-manager
description: Spotify Playlist Manager with brand-based playlist creation

scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd frontend && npm install && echo '=== Frontend dependencies installed ==='
scripts.start: cd backend && echo '=== Starting backend server ===' && STATIC_DIR=/app/backend/static PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:. gunicorn main:app --workers 4 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --timeout 120
scripts.debug: echo '=== Debug Information ===' && ls -la && ls -la frontend/build && ls -la backend/static
